SEARCH
Package othellogame.ui

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
othellogame.ui.Sound
public class Sound extends Object
Manages audio playback for different events in the Othello game application.

It uses JavaFX MediaPlayer to handle sound files.

Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy

  • Method Details

    • playSound

      public void playSound(String soundName)
      Plays the specified sound based on the given sound name.
      Parameters:
      soundName - the name of the sound to play ("menu", "game", or "exit").

    • stopSound

      public void stopSound(String soundName)
      Stops the specified sound based on the given sound name.
      Parameters:
      soundName - the name of the sound to stop ("menu", "game", or "exit").
